statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.headline: Pepperdine 71, Portland 66
article.story: PORTLAND, Ore. (AP) -- Rico Tucker scored 17 points, all of them in the second half, as Pepperdine overcame an 18-point second-half deficit to beat Portland 71-66 on Monday. Pepperdine (8-17, 2-7 West Coast Conference) trailed 33-21 at the half and 51-33 with 9:17 left. The Waves then went on 17-1 run over the next 2:31, highlighted by five 3-pointers by four different players, to trim the deficit to 52-50. Portland (8-17, 2-7) managed to extend its lead to 66-61 with 2:18 left, but Tucker completed the comeback with eight points during a 10-0 closing run. The Waves hit 7-of-13 3-pointers in the second half and 12-of-29 for the game. Mike Hornbuckle, who had 16 points, finished 4-for-8 from behind the arc. Jon Reed also hit four 3-pointers, accounting for all 12 of his points. Nik Raivio led Portland with 17 points and Robin Smeulders added 16. Pepperdine shot 26 percent from the field in the first half and 58 percent in the second half. Portland outrebounded Pepperdine 39-24, but committed 23 turnovers, many of them coming against the Waves' half-court trap.
